Event/Description: Corporate family
Resist/Check: INT vs. 12 for bonus role skill; Netrunner: reroll

Event/Description: Street orphan
Resist/Check: COOL vs. 13 to resist flaw: Cowardice/Paranoia; Fixer: reroll

Event/Description: Nomad pack/road family
Resist/Check: EMP vs. 12 to avoid distrust of outsiders; Nomad: reroll

Event/Description: All family dead or vanished
Resist/Check: COOL vs. 13 to avoid Fault: Paranoia

Event/Description: Family status in doubt (disgrace, exile, debt)
Resist/Check: COOL vs. 13 or gain Flaw: Debt

Event/Description: Family lost due to gang or corp rivalry
Resist/Check: EMP vs. 13 to resist grudge; Solo: +1, Fixer: reroll

Event/Description: Childhood friend resurfaces
Resist/Check: COOL vs. 12 to trust, EMP vs. 12 to avoid old grudge

Event/Description: Saved by a stranger (now in debt)
Resist/Check: COOL vs. 13 to avoid flaw: Debt, Fixer: reroll

Event/Description: Old ally gone crooked, now a fixer/fence
Resist/Check: COOL vs. 13 to avoid betrayal; Fixer: reroll

Event/Description: Personal enemy (gang or corp)
Resist/Check: COOL vs. 13 to avoid paranoia; Solo: reroll, Fixer: +1

Event/Description: Corporate asset frames you
Resist/Check: INT vs. 14 to clear name; Netrunner: reroll

Event/Description: Ex-lover in criminal organization
Resist/Check: EMP vs. 13 to resist flaw: Guilt

Event/Description: Betrayal: friend or employer sets you up
Resist/Check: COOL vs. 13 to avoid flaw: Disloyal; Fixer: reroll

Event/Description: Windfall: score, inheritance, or valuable item
Resist/Check: LUCK vs. 10 for lasting benefit; Techie: reroll

Event/Description: Disaster: injury or psych trauma
Resist/Check: BODY vs. 13 to avoid flaw; Medtech: reroll

Event/Description: Survived a job gone wrong
Resist/Check: COOL vs. 13 to avoid trauma; Solo: reroll

Event/Description: Burned by the law or NCPD
Resist/Check: COOL vs. 13 to avoid heat; Fixer: reroll

Event/Description: Blackmail, secret, or family debt to pay
Resist/Check: COOL vs. 13 to resist paranoia; Fixer: reroll

Event/Description: New contact, fixer, or job broker
Resist/Check: COOL vs. 12 to establish trust; Fixer: reroll

Event/Description: Reputation: major faction, corp, or gang interaction
Resist/Check: EMP vs. 13 to avoid hubris; Fixer: +1, Solo: reroll
